meanings.definition: Not able to be consumed or used up.
meanings.sent1: The rock candy was so inconsumable that it lasted for weeks.
meanings.sent2: The eternal flame in the park is truly inconsumable.
meanings.sent3: The inconsumable chocolate bar seemed to defy all attempts to finish it.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like an inconsumable fire that never dimmed.
meanings.sent5: The inconsumable energy of the sun keeps our planet warm and alive.

meanings.definition: Not subject to being consumed or used up.
meanings.sent1: The inconsumable battery in the remote control never seemed to run out.
meanings.sent2: The inconsumable knowledge of ancient civilizations fascinates historians.
meanings.sent3: The inconsumable patience of the teacher amazed her students.
meanings.sent4: His inconsumable determination to succeed drove him to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The inconsumable beauty of the sunset left everyone in awe.
